name: hello-cli
description: A basic CLI written in TypeScript meant to be used as an example or project starter
author: Tiberius Silivestru <tiberius.silivestru@gmail.com>

scripts.prebuild: npm run format:fix && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && rm -rf ./build
scripts.build:esm: swc src --config-file .swcrc-esm -d build/esm --ignore '**/*.test.ts' && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json --outDir build/esm --resolve-full-paths || exit 1
scripts.build:cjs: swc src --config-file .swcrc-cjs -d build/cjs --ignore '**/*.test.ts' && tsc-alias -p tsconfig.json --outDir build/cjs --resolve-full-paths && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > build/cjs/package.json || exit 1
scripts.build: npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && node ./add-shebang.js
scripts.build:ci: rm -rf ./build && npm run build:esm && npm run build:cjs && node ./add-shebang.js
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run typecheck && npm run lint && npm test && npm run build
scripts.clean: rm -rf ./node_modules ./build; rm package-lock.json; echo 'cleared project artifacts!'
scripts.test:integration: npm run build && vitest run tests/integration
